text: 3.19-20 Stt 6.1–7.24, 8.18, Hib 11.7, 2 Pi 2.5 God Kawnan ne ak Klays nop gek amɨl, binɨb ned kumɨl kawnan kɨli okok am nag lɨl yelak okok, kɨlop takaw agñak.3.19 Bɨ gos nɨgep ogɨnap anɨgɨl nɨgɨlak. Kawnan anɨb okok, binɨb kɨli Nowa yek ñɨn ak kumɨlak okok. Bɨ gos nɨgep ogɨnap sek pen, anɨgɨl nɨgɨlak. Jisas ne amɨl, kɨcheki kɨli bɨlel God takaw ak tɨbɨlɨkel ne kɨlop dek nag lɨl yelak okok, kɨlop agñak.
